body_html: @vrv Hi I've tried with Makefile and successfully installed tensorflow on Jetson TK1 by following RPi build (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/makefile#raspberry-pi), but I'm using tensorflow as backend for Keras, so I need python wrapping of it along with GPU support, could you please tell me how should I do that. Thank you!

body: @vrv Hi I've tried with Makefile and successfully installed tensorflow on Jetson TK1 by following RPi build (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/makefile#raspberry-pi), but I'm using tensorflow as backend for Keras, so I need python wrapping of it along with GPU support, could you please tell me how should I do that.
